content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Mar 2019I entered into a aud/sgd fixed deposit position in the past. Now that aud is depreciating further, what can i do to reduce losses? 1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Mar 2019Keep it till it matures. At least you get the fixed deposit interest. Pre-mature withdrawal most likely you lose on the conversion back to sgd and no interest credited too.Either way, still lost some due to the conversion unless you are planning to keep AUD for holidays in Australia0 comments0
